title: i think my friend has been hacked but i cant prove anything
body: so a few months ago my friend sent me a message saying how a could get some akali skin for me if i used a link , i didnt use it  and a few minutes later he told me that wasnt him and that he was gonna tell riot about it , any way now he is saying some really weird stuff and i really think he has been hacked but i cant prove it. is there anyway i can do anything,   (also kinda paranoid about using his name in public)

replies.body: Thanks for reaching out for your friend, and it does sound like it may have been accessed by a spammer.  Ask him to use our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) to recover his account, or he can send us a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if he's having any problems.  We'll be happy to help out!
damn, you took time out of your day to waste the time of someone who needs help, good luck in life i guess you will need it
